R302.1.title: Exterior Wall Envelope
R302.1.description: The exterior wall envelope shall be designed and constructed to prevent the accumulation of water within the wall assembly.

R806.1.title: Ventilation Required
R806.1.description: Enclosed attics and enclosed rafter spaces shall have ventilation. The minimum net free ventilating area shall be 1/150 of the area of the space ventilated.

E3404.1.title: General
E3404.1.description: Ground-fault circuit-interrupter protection for personnel shall be provided as required in this section.

R403.1.title: General Foundation Requirements
R403.1.description: All foundation and foundation walls shall be constructed of materials specified in Section R402 and shall be built to support all loads in accordance with Section R301.

P2903.2.title: Water Service Pipe Size
P2903.2.description: The minimum size of individual water distribution lines shall be in accordance with Table P2903.7.

R315.1.title: Carbon Monoxide Alarms
R315.1.description: Carbon monoxide alarms shall be installed in dwelling units within which fuel-burning appliances are installed.

R308.4.title: Hazardous Locations
R308.4.description: Glazing in hazardous locations shall be safety glazing conforming to CPSC 16 CFR Part 1201.

R602.10.title: Wall Bracing
R602.10.description: Buildings shall be braced in accordance with this section and intermittent braced wall lines shall be parallel to the ridgeline.

R703.1.title: General Exterior Covering
R703.1.description: Exterior walls shall provide the building with a weather-resistant exterior wall envelope.
requirements: Protection against water and air infiltration

R905.2.title: Asphalt Shingles
R905.2.description: Asphalt shingles shall be installed in accordance with the manufacturer's installation instructions.

M1411.3.title: Condensate Disposal
M1411.3.description: Condensate from all cooling coils and evaporators shall be conveyed from the drain pan outlet to an approved place of disposal.

E3605.1.title: Receptacle Outlets Required
E3605.1.description: Receptacles shall be installed such that no point along the floor line of any wall space is more than 6 feet from a receptacle outlet.
